server_id.description: The unique server ID generated at start

server_name.description: The configured server name, equals ID when not set

version.description: The version of the running server

proto.description: The protocol version this server supports

git_commit.description: The git repository commit hash that the build corresponds with

go.description: The version of Go used to build this binary

host.description: The hostname the server runs on

port.description: The port the server listens on for client connections

auth_required.description: Indicates if users are required to authenticate to join the server

tls_required.description: Indicates if connections must use TLS when connecting to this server

tls_verify.description: Indicates if full TLS verification will be performed

tls_ocsp_peer_verify.description: Indicates if the OCSP protocol will be used to verify peers

ip.description: The IP address the server listens on if set

connect_urls.description: The list of URLs NATS clients can use to connect to this server

ws_connect_urls.description: The list of URLs websocket clients can use to connect to this server

max_connections.description: The maximum amount of connections the server can accept
max_connections.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

max_subscriptions.description: The maximum amount of subscriptions the server can manage

ping_interval.description: The interval the server will send PING messages during periods of inactivity on a connection

ping_max.description: The number of unanswered PINGs after which the connection will be considered stale

http_host.description: The HTTP host monitoring connections are accepted on

http_port.description: The port monitoring connections are accepted on

http_base_path.description: The path prefix for access to monitor endpoints

https_port.description: The HTTPS port monitoring connections are accepted on

auth_timeout.description: The amount of seconds connections have to complete authentication

max_control_line.description: The amount of bytes a signal control message may be

max_payload.description: The maximum amount of bytes a message may have as payload

max_pending.description: The maximum amount of unprocessed bytes a connection may have

addr.description: The host the cluster listens on for connections

cluster_port.description: The port the cluster listens on for connections

auth_timeout.description: The time cluster connections have to complete authentication

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

tls_required.description: Indicates if TLS is required for connections

tls_verify.description: Indicates if full verification of TLS connections is performed

pool_size.description: The configured route connection pool size

host.description: The host the gateway listens on for connections

port.description: The port gateway connections listens on

auth_timeout.description: The time cluster connections have to complete authentication

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

tls_required.description: Indicates if TLS is required for connections

tls_verify.description: Indicates if full verification of TLS connections is performed

advertise.description: The URL advertised to remote gateway clients

connect_retries.description: How many connection attempts the route will make

name.description: The name of the remote gateway

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

reject_unknown.description: Indicates if unknown cluster connections will be rejected

host.description: The host the server listens on

port.description: The port the server listens on

auth_timeout.description: The time Leafnode connections have to complete authentication

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

tls_required.description: Indicates if TLS is required for connections

tls_verify.description: Indicates if full verification of TLS connections is performed

local_account.description: The local account this leaf is logged into

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

urls.description: The list of URLs for the remote Leafnode connection

deny.description: Lists of subjects not allowed to be imported/exported

tls_ocsp_peer_verify.description: Indicates if OCSP verification will be done
Indicates if OCSP verification will be performed

host.description: The host the server listens on

port.description: The port the server listens on

no_auth_user.description: The user that will be used for unauthenticated connections

auth_timeout.description: How long authentication has to complete

tls_map.description: Indicates if TLS Mapping is enabled

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

tls_pinned_certs.description: The list of certificates pinned to this connection

js_domain.description: The JetStream domain used for MQTT state

ack_wait.description: How long the internal JetStream state store will allow acks to complete
ack_wait.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

max_ack_pending.description: How many outstanding acks the internal JetStream state store will allow

tls_ocsp_peer_verify.description: Indicates if OCSP verification will be done

host.description: The host the server listens on

port.description: The port the server listens on

advertise.description: The connection URL the server advertises

no_auth_user.description: The user that will be used for unauthenticated connections

jwt_cookie.description: The name of a cookie the server will read for the connection JWT

handshake_timeout.description: How long the connection has to complete the websocket setup
handshake_timeout.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

auth_timeout.description: How long authentication has to complete

tls_map.description: Indicates if TLS Mapping is enabled

tls_pinned_certs.description: The list of certificates pinned to this connection

same_origin.description: Indicates if same origin connections are allowed

tls_ocsp_peer_verify.description: Indicates if OCSP verification will be done

max_memory.description: The maximum size of memory type streams

max_storage.description: The maximum size of file store type streams

sync_interval.description: How frequently we sync to disk in the background by calling fsync
sync_interval.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

sync_always.description: Indicates flushes are done after every write

unique_tag.description: The unique tag assigned to this instance

strict.description: Indicates if strict JSON parsing is performed

stats.description: Statistics about JetStream for this server

api.description: Stats about the API usage for this server

level.description: The active API level this server implements

total.description: The total API requests received since start

errors.description: The total API requests that resulted in error responses

inflight.description: The number of API requests currently being served

leader.description: The server name of the cluster leader

items.description: Information about all the peers in the cluster that are supporting the stream or consumer

name.description: The unique name for the peer

current.description: Indicates if it was seen recently and fully caught up

offline.description: Indicates if it has not been seen recently

active.description: The timestamp it was last active
active.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

lag.description: How many operations behind it is

peer.description: The unique ID for the peer

cluster_size.description: The known size of the cluster

pending.description: How many RAFT messages are not yet processed

limits.description: Active limits for the meta cluster

max_request_batch.description: The maximum amount of updates that can be sent in a batch

max_ack_pending.description: The server limit for maximum amount of outstanding Acks

max_ha_assets.description: The maximum of Streams and Consumers that may have more than 1 replica

max_duplicate_window.description: The maximum value for duplicate tracking on Streams
max_duplicate_window.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

max_batch_inflight_per_stream.description: The maximum amount of open batches per stream

max_batch_inflight_total.description: The maximum amount of total open batches per server

max_batch_size.description: The maximum amount of messages allowed in a batch publish to a Stream

max_batch_timeout.description: The maximum time to receive the commit message after receiving the first message of a batch
max_batch_timeout.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

tls_timeout.description: How long TLS operations have to complete

write_deadline.description: The maximum time writes to sockets have to complete
write_deadline.$comment: nanoseconds depicting a duration in time, signed 64 bit integer

start.description: Time when the server was started

now.description: The current time of the server

uptime.description: How long the server has been running

cores.description: The number of cores the process has access to

total_connections.description: The total connections the server have ever handled

routes.description: The number of connected route servers

in_msgs.description: The number of messages this server received

out_msgs.description: The number of message this server sent

in_bytes.description: The number of bytes this server received

out_bytes.description: The number of bytes this server sent

slow_consumers.description: The total count of clients that were disconnected since start due to being slow consumers

stale_connections.description: The total count of stale connections that were detected

stalled_clients.description: The total number of times that clients have been stalled

http_req_stats.description: The number of requests each HTTP endpoint received

config_load_time.description: The time the configuration was loaded or reloaded

config_digest.description: A calculated hash of the current configuration

tags.description: The tags assigned to the server in configuration

metadata.description: The metadata assigned to the server in configuration

trusted_operators_jwt.description: The JWTs for all trusted operators

trusted_operators_claim.description: The decoded claims for each trusted operator

system_account.description: The name of the System account

pinned_account_fails.description: How often user logon fails due to the issuer account not being pinned

cache_type.description: The kind of cache being used

cache_hits.description: How many times the cache was able to answer a request

cache_misses.description: How many times the cache failed to answer a request

cached_responses.description: How many responses are currently stored in the cache

cached_revoked_responses.description: How many of the stored cache entries are revokes

cached_good_responses.description: How many of the stored cache entries are good responses

cached_unknown_responses.description: How many of the stored cache entries are unknown responses

slow_consumer_stats.description: Information about slow consumers from different type of connections

clients.description: How many Clients were slow consumers

routes.description: How many Routes were slow consumers

gateways.description: How many Gateways were slow consumers

leafs.description: How many Leafnodes were slow consumers

stale_connection_stats.description: Information about stale consumers from different type of connections
